g.text: [12] Liao R, Fu YP, Wang T, et al. Metavir and FIB-4 scores are associated
with patient prognosis after curative hepatectomy in hepatitis B virus-
related hepatocellular carcinoma: a retrospective cohort study at two
centers in China. Oncotarget 2017;8:1774

ﬁ
cant
prognostic factor in patients with non-B non-C hepatocellular carcinoma
after curative surgery. Langenbecks Arch Surg 2016;401:195

ﬁ
cance of the
FIB-4 index for non-B non-C hepatocellular carcinoma treated with

ﬁ
brosis marker can
predict recurrence of hepatocellular carcinoma after radiofrequency

relative noninvasive models in patients with hepatocellular carcinoma.

the risk for hepatocellular carcinoma: national surveillance program of

Intern Med 1999;131:174

ﬁ
brosis marker in
chronic hepatitis C patients. J Gastroenterol 2014;49:1495

as a predictor for long-term outcomes of hepatocellular carcinoma
